The Tenant conﬁrms that before the date of this deed:-
the Landlord served a notice dated
on the Tenant in accordance with section 38A(3)(a) of the 1954 Act
receipt of the Notice in accordance with schedule 2 to the 2003 Order
The Tenant further conﬁrms that where the Declaration was made by a person other than the
Tenant that person was duly authorised by the Tenant to make the Declaration on the Tenant’s
The Landlord and the Tenant conﬁrm that the Tenant was not contractually bound to enter into
the tenancy created by this deed prior to the date of completion of this deed
The parties agree that sections 24 to 28 (inclusive) of the 1954 Act will not apply to the tenancy

Time is of the essence for the purposes of this clause 7.
If any Yearly Rent has been paid by the Tenant in relation to the period falling after the relevant
Termination Date it will be refunded by the Landlord to the Tenant within fourteen days of the
date of termination of the Term in accordance with the provisions of this clause 7. Any Yearly
